text: Playlist #12 has been created! One of the greatest RPGs ever made. Certainly near the top in terms of story and characters (villains included). There's still really nothing quite like the Suikoden series, but hey it's another one in the list of series that Konami decided to forget. A real shame.

author: TBD Art

text: I love this series, and especially this game in this series.  But what really is special for the first two games, especially, is the music, I think.  The composer really worked her heart out and put everything into it.  (Actually ... she worked so hard she burnt herself out, which is why we haven't seen anything else from her ^^;;; )
author: terracannon876

text: IIRC she did a few pieces for Suikoden 3, just much less.
author: Dessa

text: I don't remember seeing her name in the credits, but it's possible.  She also contributed to a collaboration album between her and Mitsuda (Chrono series, etc.) after this, but I can't remember anything else.
